description: The case was being watched by other European cities facing a shortage of rental housing.
title: France Airbnb: Paris hails victory over short-stay rents
title_page: France Airbnb: Paris hails victory over short-stay rents - BBC News
maintext: Pointing out that it was not party to the case, Airbnb added that the ruling related to second homes and not people's primary residences, so would, it said, have little or no impact in Paris.
